00027 #include <Inventor/lists/SbPList.h>
00028 
00029 class SoEngineOutput;
00030 
00031 class COIN_DLL_API SoEngineOutputList : public SbPList {
00032 public:
00033   SoEngineOutputList(void) : SbPList() { }
00034   SoEngineOutputList(const int sizehint) : SbPList(sizehint) { }
00035   SoEngineOutputList(const SoEngineOutputList & l) : SbPList(l) { }
00036   
00037   void append(SoEngineOutput * output) {
00038     SbPList::append((void *) output);
00039   }
00040   void insert(SoEngineOutput * output, const int insertbefore) { 
00041     SbPList::insert((void *) output, insertbefore); 
00042   }
00043   SoEngineOutput * operator [](const int idx) const {
00044     return (SoEngineOutput*) SbPList::operator[](idx);
00045   }
00046   void set(const int idx, SoEngineOutput * item) {
00047     SbPList::operator[](idx) = (void*) item;
00048   }
00049 };
00050
